title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.
highlights: model library (Llama-3, Phi-3, Gemma, Mistral, etc.)

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers for chains, agents, and RAG.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming, and utilities for Spring & Android apps.

title: ollamac
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI app that wraps Ollama for a chat-like experience with conversation history.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Community-enhanced Go CLI with interactive chat, prompt templates, and shell completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for building RAG pipelines using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Python toolkit that fine-tunes Ollama models for chemical name/structure conversion and property prediction.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama containers and runs model tests in isolated environments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generative and embedding components.

title: ollama-rb (Ruby gem)
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic client for chat, generate, pull, and embed with Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers, and Blazor samples.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing Ollama endpoints with Tokio, Serde, and an Axum example server.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support and build.zig integration.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into servers with slash commands and moderation filters.
